General.Name: Kanger International Bhd
General.Description: Kanger International Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the construction business in Malaysia and the People's Republic of China. It operates through Manufacturing, Trading and Project Management Services; and Research and Development segments. The company trades in construction products and material, medical and healthcare equipment, pharmaceutical medicinal products, and medical disposable items; and manufactures gloves. It is also involved in the property development and project management; and bamboo trading activities. Kanger International Berhad was founded in 2004 and is based in Balakong, Malaysia.
